snippet: A judge on Friday found a South Carolina mother who drove her three children into the Atlantic Ocean not guilty of felony child abuse by reason of insanity.
lead_paragraph: A judge on Friday found a South Carolina mother who drove her three children into the Atlantic Ocean not guilty of felony child abuse by reason of insanity.

headline.main: Florida: Mother Ruled Insane in Attack
headline.print_headline: Florida: Mother Ruled Insane In Attack
